name: Take the Money and Run
description:
The perfect plan...  What happens when someone else has it too?

Take control of one of two robbers both plotting to make a dash for the bag of cash.

Plot each move wisely as this game is played in turns of selecting  your action and then watching it be executed.

Based on an old school-yard game, played with ones hands.

Player 1:

Arrow Keys = Movement/Menus

N = Shoot/Select               M = Reload/Back

Player 2:

WASD = Movement/Menus

G = Shoot/Select               H = Reload/Back

1-2 Players

Gamepads supported

If I had a little more time I would have loved to have made a better instructions screen, a tournament mode, and some actual AI. May work on this in a later Jam. I hope someone enjoys this underlying mechanic  wrapped in a rough package.

Thanks to all who played!
